fields.text: Thank you for calling Amazon Web Services in San Francisco, your enterprise B2B cloud and AI partner—start building on AWS today.
For sales and enterprise solutions, press [INDEX].
To discuss enterprise deployments and custom integrations, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our Enterprise Solutions team.
For AI and machine learning services information, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our AI and Machine Learning specialists.
For support with your AWS services, press [INDEX].
For technical support and troubleshooting, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to AWS technical support.
For billing, account management, and invoices, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our Billing and Account team.
